lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Indeed. Returning to be awesome fans of the show and friends and Sam do you have anything to say about that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We love Marvel Puzzle Quest and they love that we love them. In fact, Puzzle Quest had a bunch of critters come up to their booth at Gen-con to say hi, and they wanted to thank the community for being so awesome and welcoming. The game is legitimately awesome. It is so awesome, it is so epic that me talking about it doesn't do justice. Really it needs another artform. One that is an amazing theatrical experience and expression of joy and emotion. It needs opera.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So combining Puccini and Marvel Puzzle Quest, I give you an operadvertisement. Shit, that music.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wait!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, it's okay. This is going to be terrible anyway. (singing) The new SHIELD clearance level nine lands today, bro. Better rewards and challenges you can recruit Lockjaw the inhuman doggo. For more chances to summon Black Bolt, other Inhumans, and Kamala Khan, and boost the power of your superhero squad. Last but not least, for a limited time you can also recruit the Silver Surfer and Thanos and Star-Lord and the cosmic legends pack. (speaking) Oh shit, I forgot my props. (singing) From now until the 30th of September. Marvel Puzzle Quest. Marvel Puzzle Quest! (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Merch, what have we got?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, how do you say it? Is it Dalen's--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's Dalen.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you. Jesus.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's got "Stay Turnt" on it. It's a thing for Talks Machina.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, man. It got Foster in front. Stay Turnt.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 8-Bit Foster!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's cute.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have you seen it, Ashley?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I have, and I may have one. I almost wore it tonight, but it is in the dirty hamper.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a good reason.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Also, there's all the other stuff that I always say.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Also, Ashley, we miss you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We miss you so much!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Look at that pretty face!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You in your little pink hat! We just love you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, issue one of Critical Role: Vox Machina Origins is out. Super excited. I'm really proud of it. Matt Colville did an incredible job.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He did such a good job with the dialogue.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Super proud of it, super excited.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I get it on my Zune?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's only on PalmPilot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can get it on Kindle, Nook, iBooks, Google Play-- I should have read the list.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I made that list specifically so you could reference it. That's fine. I do these things. It's okay. I don't mind.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just look it up on Geek and Sundry. You're going to get a quicker answer, though, if you look it up on Geek and Sundry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We knew we picked the right people for the job, but even so, it far exceeded our expectations. It came together really well.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's so good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We've been freaking out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We've been reading it out loud. Pretending to be those characters.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, Sam hates it, though.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I love it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Needs more Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's like season one of The Office. Pretty good, but it gets way better.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: American Office or British Office?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: American.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Laura and Travis, you're going to be at Anime Weekend Atlanta.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A.W.A. next weekend. Friday, Saturday, and Sunday in Hotlanta. Come see us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're going to say hi. What are we doing there?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We've got panels. We got autograph sessions. We got chances to take pictures, and eat food, and we're going to run through the quad streaking.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, he is. I'm going to take pictures.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Tequila. Yeah, so that stuff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, Vox Machina, what would you like to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cry? Hold each other.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So we were going up a tunnel?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we need to keep going up. Oh, somebody needs to heal Scanlan.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think it was the other side of your face last week.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it was the same side.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I palm Scanlan by the face and cast Lay On Hands. How bad are you, buddy?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know, medium.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Medium?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think it's more like when your toe was missing. I think it's like that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm dumping 29 hit points of paladin power into your face.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Isn't that most of your paladin power?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, it's all but one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh dear god.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But what if you needed that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We've got other people who can do healing spells.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As he reaches out and his fingers touch the side of your face, you feel the muscles tighten and the skin begin to reform. As he pulls away, there's still a little bit of reddish rash or irritation of fresh skin, but the scarring seems to have subsided and your face is intact.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Am I handsome again?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We like you handsome.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I liked the new way. This is old "I know this" face.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'm sorry. I'm boring. I bore you now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just a little bit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll get a tattoo.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What are we doing now?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, okay. Then we keep going forward.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think it's a chunnel, actually.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A chunnel?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep. Small difference.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's a chunnel?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a tunnel that goes under the English Channel. Wherever that is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So forward then, huh? Where's everybody at health-wise? Are you solid?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm pretty good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I guess I'm all right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pike? How are you?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think I'm okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You got hit a couple times in that last fight.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I did. I think I'm okay, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is this a short rest that we're doing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's up to you guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's up to us. We could take 30 minutes or just keep moving.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's keep moving forward.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Look, I know we haven't said it much, but Pike, I am glad you are here. I just felt like saying that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Me, too. I know we have been here this whole time, but thank you for instilling confidence in me yet again.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, no problem.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Love you, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Love you, Pike!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you guys are continuing up the staircase?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes. Sneaky fucks in front.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Marching order? All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sneaky fucks in front.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should I do Pass Without a Trace, because they might have some inkling suspicion that we're on--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How many more of those do you have?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I've got one level two spell left and all my level threes. I can cast it at a higher level, because most of my spells are pointless at this point.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll go behind the twins.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll go behind Percy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Everybody's got plus ten to their stealth.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pike and I got the rear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket is in your necklace or out now?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm bamfing him back out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But we are being sneaky.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but we've got Pass Without a Trace.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Famous last words.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket is out and being stealthy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perfect. As you continue up the stone stairway, you said you were looking for traps? I figured.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Always.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Slow moving up the steps as you slowly are looking for-- okay, go for it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: For traps, for investigations, that is 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this distance, you can see the rough shape of three carved archways at the base of this inverted mass of earth that curves down and collapses half of this cavern. About 40 or so feet apart. You can see at each of these entrances, there are some figures, some shapes. They are too far from you at the moment, hundreds of feet away from you, to make any sort of clear vision, but you see a few bits of torchlight in the distance and shifting shadows near those entrances.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we in a dark tunnel? They can't see us, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently, you guys are emerging from underneath in this small rubble. There is no light in here. The only bit of light you can see is some of that bio-luminescent fungus that you had in that previous tunnel and the torchlight across the way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we put out your hands? So that they can't see us? Well, there's a bunch of people off in the distance.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm pretty quiet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but you have to stay within

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 30 if you want to keep Pass Without a Trace. 60 to stay within the ring.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'd probably be good without it. And we could go together about 50 feet away from the group, and then I could go a little bit further and see if I can get a better look.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's stick around to the sides.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Vast space? Big, wide open?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a wide space. As the cavern opens in this large, dome-like interior path, loosely kidney bean shaped or a wide oval, half of it is currently crushed and occupied by this darker mass of Shadowfell earth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's sitting on top of it? That's the city? The roots of the city crushing down--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's the roots of the city crushing down into this chamber.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Could be a Rick and Morty portal to the Shadowfell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where the titan ends and Thomara begins would be this particular threshold.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we could go up from here? This is where we go up. You can get that sphere again and tunnel up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have the sphere.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, we go straight into the city.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, the sphere is back in the tunnel with you. You can concentrate on it and bring it with you and it moves at a very slow speed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We haven't moved very far.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We've only gone a little bit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, I'll bring it as far as we've gone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Cool. So what's your intelligence modifier, again?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Now it's three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's slower than any of you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, but we're just walking here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you make your way up the tunnels, this hovering ball of dense death and destruction is (humming).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Simon Three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Humming ominously, Simon Three makes its way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does it make that sound?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it noisy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does give off vibration and a noise to it. You do hear the subtle hum.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How far away from it do we have to be in order to not hear the hum?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About 80 or so feet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's further than I thought.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's going to reveal our position, isn't it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's very faint sound.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They are a couple hundred feet away.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You still have Silence?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We still have some cloaks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can put one on the Sphere?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, put them on us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Disguise him! Put him in a hat, gloves.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to instantly throw a robe over top of Scanlan. You've got a robe on you now. I put a robe on, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you put on a robe and Scanlan puts on a robe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They know that the orb was with two of the others, so as long as we keep the distance, everything should be fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, so now we're legit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we look like we're with them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, twins? How do our flanks look if we move forward? Is it just trees? Is it buildings?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was about to ask. We see flickering light far away, but I don't trust anything. I want to specifically see if anything besides twitching fingers and toes are hiding closer to us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I'm listening for voices. Do I hear anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Between the both of you focusing in the still silence, you can hear very faint distant muttering of conversation, briefly, on the left archway. But around you, aside from the small skittering of an occasional hand that is crawling its way forward, you don't see any full-bodied undead. In fact, in comparison to the chamber you'd exited more than an hour ago, which had hundreds and hundreds of wandering undead, this is mostly vacant of anything that isn't directly at those archways.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Which are how far away from us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're about 150 or so feet. They're right at the center part of where the chamber would be, where the earth of Thar Amphala's current resting place begins.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're not within the distance of 80, so they wouldn't be able to hear the orb.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, great. Send it straight at them, then.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Definitely.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Austin Powers it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It could in theory collapse the arches, if you were so inclined.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, but we're in here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could collapse all the rest of the tunnels and we go straight up into the city.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a tiny ball.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sounds a bit like bringing the city to us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How big is the ball, again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The ball is about two feet in diameter.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Grog's not going to fit in that hole.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It could curlicue up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't trust you as a sphere artisan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But with you by my side, your engineering wits and my ball-handling skills, we'll be fine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: As legendary as your ball-handling skills are--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Make a ball-handling check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Roll 2d6.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I volunteer as tribute!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't see how I could possibly help with this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm afraid it might slow us down.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Here's a question, if you start thinking of it going in a particular direction, does it keep going in that direction?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or does it have a radius where it stops listening to me? Let's give it a shot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We could send it in a direction?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, that's fun.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, let's send it off towards one of those torches.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Destroying everything in its path for forever.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's find out, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or we could send it straight up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to concentrate on Simon Three and send it back the way we came. Not hitting anything. Just to see how far it goes before I lose telekinetic connection with it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It continues until it's out of sight. So it starts digging and burrowing--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it still going?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As soon as you send it downward at an angle, it hits the floor and begins carving its own path, tunneling lower and lower--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How far away is it now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point? I'd say it's about 70 feet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Come back!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It begins to slowly come back in your direction.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You finally found a worse pet than Trinket. Well done. I love Trinket.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: By the way, what direction is Vecna from us now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sourcing it would be upwards, at an angle, from where you see the base of Thar Amphala. It's in that direction, at an upward angle. You get the sense that this is near the edge of the city.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we see any light from above us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Other than the very faint bio-luminescence left by the little patches of dull orange here and there that give you a sense of the overall scope and enclosure of the chamber, no other light source. There's no opening.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So the option is really to keep moving forward and find our way out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Same option as ten minutes ago.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The figures in the distance. Can we tell by scale how big they are? Do they look humanoid or bigger?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't fuck me, Gil.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: To control the sphere, is it just will?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It obeys me because I asserted my dominance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The middle archway, you see another humanoid figure, but armored. You can see the sharp edges of plated shoulders and a helmet. And a few other skeletal figures wandering around, but one. At the very very edge of the one torch that it holds you see one large hulking figure, about ten or so feet tall. But you only see the very edge; you don't actually see the rest of the body. All you see is the edge of the shoulder or the beginning of the side.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's one way, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's three ways.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Have a humanoid silhouette on the head and shoulders, but they're down on the ground, almost like a dog. Between the two of them, there is one humanoid figure that's still hunched slightly, but still standing upright, hooded and cloaked.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do they appear to be looking for something? Or are they wandering like a patrol?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you watch them for a moment, you see they do move a little bit, glancing around the area, keeping a watch, but they appear to be stationed there with a minor patrol in the vicinity.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can they see each other?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For the most part. They are about 40 feet from each other. As there is a curve, the right and the left archway probably have a hard time seeing each other. The middle one has a view of each. Occasionally, they'll interface; they converse a bit between the two of them. But for the most part they're definitely keeping a look out. They're very vigilant and looking out into the empty space before them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Seeing which way Keyleth is looking, Vax stands a bit on tiptoe and puts his chin on her shoulder and looks in the distance, and sees the armored figure. Are we close enough to tell if that armored figure has a sword?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can lend the scope of my gun, if that helps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, that would probably help. Make a perception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What is that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Scope?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just a series of lenses--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So this is the central figure in the armor?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's wearing similar armor, not to the knight you had encountered with Vecna, more the blackened armored knight that you had battled at the ziggurat on Marquet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: When you first encountered Delilah Briarwood and you found the pathway into the Shadowfell.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that the same guy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well no, you murdered that one. But it's similar set of armor, yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I let Grog look through the scope.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (gasping) They're right here! (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I regret nothing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughing) Ashley's face. Oh no.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Are you scared?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do you see?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pike's so brave. So brave.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Through Skype, it's like my niece sat down at the table to start playing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we scry on the death knight or on Delilah to see if they're with Vecna right now? Because if they're separate from him, then what if they're in these chambers?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. I will use a 5th-level spell to scry. As opposed to the Scrying Eye. Does my Scrying Eye use my spellcasting ability? No, it's 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's 15. It's tied to the item.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to scry on--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Death knight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He probably would be less aware. If you scry on Delilah--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. That death knight that seems to be the right-hand man.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can scry through the ring, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the ring say?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hold on. I have to find it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I didn't even think about that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Band of Shrouds. While attuned, all creatures and their belongings within 60 feet of the bearer are immune to most divine magics that would locate or reveal the whereabouts of the creature.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can scry outside of it, but you cannot scry into it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, let's do it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Most divining magics. That doesn't mean we're immune to everything.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to scry on that big guy that was with Delilah when I saw them walking out.

lines.name: TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: Armor bro.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With your spell?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: With mine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Hold on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Matt's finding his murder sheet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How are your magical reserves?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're all right. I'm using my last 5th-level spell for this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In an instant, there's a rush of momentum and energy, and you see footsteps. You see before you the death knight that you had previously encountered in the struggle is stepping up these dark, ruddy stone steps. One, two, three, you can hear the echo surround you in this slightly curving staircase.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I see Delilah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do not. Unfortunately, you see a very vague image of a room that's disappearing behind him as it curves around where you can see two other armored figures similar to the one that's in the center archway that are standing watch in that chamber. They vanish as he curves around, and you watch as he steps up, step-step-step.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I get any other details on where he is? Can I see any other identifying landmarks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently it's a windowless stairway that curves.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is he going upwards?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, he's in a tower.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, maybe. What else does she see?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You now see the top of the tower exposed where three large hooked, stone spires curve inward to a familiar top of the tower.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's trying to do it again!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Out of the corner of your eye, you see-- the sky itself, from this perspective, has this weird sickly blue-green tint to it, and as you try and focus beyond the proximity of the knight, you get a glimmer of some shape currently gliding in the air above. Then a voice says "No," and--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You were scrying on the death knight, not Vecna!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He doesn't know who it's from.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or where.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He probably detected it, but he doesn't know who. Or where. Said the barbarian about the god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Knowing, as you've cast the spell before, a creature that can see invisible objects sees the sensor as a luminous orb about the size of your fist. Creatures that can see invisible can see the source of a scry spell.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can see the source?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not necessarily, but they can see that something is scrying on the space. As soon as you kick back you're like, "Shit. That's probably what it was."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shit, that's probably what it was.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He knows we're coming.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There was that moment when you two were falling to your deaths before we entered the titan. You were away from me, so it's possible that he knows.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm sure he knows we're around.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do we want to deal with these people or get around them?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we see any other tunnels that aren't guarded?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa. That's a big fat no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's real dark, and you have to travel deeper into the actual cavern space to try and see any other tunnels.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's no peeling around the sides of this? There's too much rubble and shit? This huge space that we're in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it encompasses the entire opposite side of this. This was at one point a 250- to 300-foot-long cavern, but half of it is entirely occupied by the base of Thar Amphala.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Couldn't Scanlan look like one of the mages we killed and walk up and be like, "All "clear, everybody. Go home. It's all done."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can totally try that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What was his name?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He had a name?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He did have a name. What was the name? You wrote it down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The names of the people we killed? We know their names?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, you wrote it down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Odell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Odell.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tell Viscon we have visitors. I wrote that in quotes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could be one of them. I have an orb of destruction next to me that would seem like his.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you could walk it up real close and be like--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Be like, we're going to tunnel in this one now, so move.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you remember what Odell looked like?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. We just killed him, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Odell seemed to be a more high-ranking member of Vecna's forces.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Which was the one who was controlling the orb, though?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait a second. Scanlan could do that, but he can't go by himself! We all have to creep along with him, or be found out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I won't be alone. I'll have Simon with me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We all have to go together so we don't fall out of range of her ring.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is true. We're going to be within 60 feet of you, very stealthily.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're all stuck together, unfortunately.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can you send them down there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Send who down where?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The rest of them to help the other-- We tell them they need help down below, in the cavern where we murdered everybody. You're Odell. Viscon might be one of them. Send them down there to see if there's a problem, then cave them in when they all go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How far are they from us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're about 140 or so feet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Send who?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We trap them with explosives and shit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How is it that Grog is following me right now? Am I making that little sense?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Always the tone of surmise.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How many robes do we have? Are we going to claim that we're there to relieve them of their shift? Is that what you're pitching?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, we're going to say we're going to tunnel in that area now, so they have to clear out or else they'll be caved in.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We send one of us up as Odell to tell Viscon there's a problem down there and that we need everybody to help because we found something.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we heard rumblings down there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not people, don't let anyone know there's people, but there's definitely something interesting.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But you people have to be near me when I do this. How is that going to happen?

lines.name: TALIESIN, LAURA
lines.text: We're going to hide.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there anything to hide behind?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's dark, and there are a number of dwarven buildings in various levels of disrepair and collapsing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As we get closer, I can use Hide in Plain Sight and camouflage all of us to where they can walk by us and they won't see us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Additionally, we can play monkey in the middle; as long as Vex is in the center you can be 50 feet or so ahead, and everyone else can be either with Vex or back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, this actually sounds like a plan, which means it will go terribly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're 120 feet from us?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, we'll move forward a bit, and then I can camouflage all of you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, an actor prepares. Who am I? What's my motivation? Am I Odell? If so, why does Odell have the sphere with him?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because he's going to tunnel in that tunnel.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Look, Odell went to Vecna because his wife left him because she's like, "Oh, you're not very "powerful." And he's like, "I will find and show you power." So you went to Vecna and you gouged your eye out. But then your depth perception is off now. So then you're like, "I'm going to work "my way up through the ranks."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But then you went back and she was like, "Now you're hideous. Now I'm not taking you back at all!" And you were spiteful, so you went back and turned to a life of crime and deceit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, I'll show her. I'll show all of them! I like this. Good backstory.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pike, smack Scanlan. Let him know.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I smack him on the butt. Go get them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait. Who's Viscon? Which one is he?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Odell was the one holding the sphere, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes. Because one of the other minion guys was like, "Odell, go tell Viscon."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, but he was running away. He wasn't the one holding the sphere.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Odell wasn't holding the sphere.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was the green robe guy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who's the green robe guy, then?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Gray. Yeah, it was gray. Hold on, I pull it out and look at it. Yeah, it was gray.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, we have the actual robe? Just give me that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are they written on the tags like a school play?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, does it have his name written in it anywhere so he keeps track of it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll an investigation check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Property of Jimmy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, this is pretty good. 24.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: "If found, return to--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "Property of--"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is which one?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is the gray robe.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I thought green!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was gray, the guy that was controlling the orb.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know these people have anal-retentiveness issues.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No! The red guy was holding the orb. The green guy put up the force wall and ran away.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So we want the red?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The red robe. I'm looking at the red robe.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Because the red robe was Odell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know! We don't know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vax starts quietly praying to the Raven Queen in a corner right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Odell is the one that ran off.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, so that's not the one we want; we want the one in red that was controlling the orb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Viskorad.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did we ever hear his name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. "Turn back and tell that Viskorad found sneaky prey."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Viskorad. My name is Viskorad.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you want to know his backstory? (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll just use the same one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Viskorad and Viscon are two different people?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I might have mis-said it at the moment. I was on painkillers.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So there is no Viscon, there's a Viscorad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's looking forward to vacation when this is all over.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We know the other one was named Odell and he's dead. So I can go over to them and say, "They've killed Odell."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, don't say that there's anybody that they need to watch out for. Don't set them on alert! No, tell them you found something interesting and Odell is investigating it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So they need to go get what?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They need to go down into the tunnel to help him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, but what is the thing that we found?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Anything you'd like.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Your long-lost wedding ring from your past marriage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not that, but yes. We found something interesting. It's strange, possibly dangerous, possibly useful.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You definitely need help for it. Vecna's going to be thrilled! Everybody's going to get promotions.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Odell is still down there. He needs some help. I'm going to go talk to Vec while they go help Ode. Right? I'm going to put on my Hat of Disguise and become as close to that man's form as I can. Wait, was he a human? Was he an elf?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's human.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He was human?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we sneak forward. Trinket's going back into his necklace. It's too dangerous, buddy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Moles and trolls. Red leather, yellow leather.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So as soon as we get within a hundred feet of them I'm going to do Hide in Plain Sight on everybody and camouflage everybody so that they--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so Hide in Plain Sight and camouflage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: On top of Pass Without a Trace. Hide in Plain Sight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We could hide in a house, one of the ruins.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We've got camo paint and camo clothes, while carrying a bush.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hide in Plain Sight is the camouflage you're referring to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just to disguise everyone so that they're super hidden.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pike can get on my back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Camouflage you can really only do on yourself.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can use my ranger skills to cover people!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, you can Arnold-Schwarzenegger-in-Predator this for other folks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're keeping within Pass Without a Trace.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say make a wisdom check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: To see if I can actually do it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To see how well you manage to mask the terrain nearby.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I stand ten feet away from her and give her a plus two. Oh, that's so low.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know. Eight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Plus two!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, a wisdom saving throw or a check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A check. It looks like, unfortunately, the shale and broken rock in this vicinity, it's hard to find anything that would actually help hide them, beyond their natural stealth roll. So you're going have to rely on your Pass Without a Trace.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we have to stay within 30 feet of me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll stay in there. We're going to get into the ruins and have our guns trained in case anything goes wrong.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan, stay within 60 feet of me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keyleth finds some black dirt on the ground and gives a war paint.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Remember, if anything goes wrong, it's been a pleasure working with you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wonderful. We have the jenga. We can do the jenga!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're the only one who'll be saying jenga, pretty much.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, you can do the jenga. What do we do if it's jenga?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We kill everyone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We think well of you and move on.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ready to run in.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The only person going forward is you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait! Before he goes, I grab him, and I cast Freedom of Movement on him. You can't be grappled.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you cast something to help his charisma and his persuasion?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, actually, I can, because Freedom of Movement is not a concentration spell. So I'm going to burn my last 2nd-level spell and do Enhance Ability to give you--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Advantage on charisma checks?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Peacock's Charisma or whatever the fuck it's called.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Note you have Freedom of Movement. How long does it last? Is it an hour?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: An hour.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone else who's not going forward, make a stealth check, please.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's plus ten!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's do the druid dice. Oh yeah, that's good!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Natural 20. 47.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're going to be in triple digits soon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He appears in another game. Somewhere in Deep Valley.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go back and watch previous episodes, and Liam's not there. It's really weird.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Somewhere in the future, there's an Acquisitions Inc. game going, and my head pops in from the side, and then pulls out again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I love it. Perfect.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I got 43.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's pretty good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all stay as quiet as possible, moving along the exterior of Vex's ability to move forward. You move forward slowly while keeping Scanlan in sight. You slowly begin to move forward, with Simon Three humming slowly in front of you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I am going to limp as I go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Interesting character choice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Strong choices, commit to them a hundred percent.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are quietly stepping through, and you hear his footfalls echoing, and immediately you see some of the torches shift, and there's some talk and some whispering back and forth and a small shout. You watch as some of the skeletal entities at two of the entrances shift and look in that direction, and begin to shamble slowly. The two torch-bearers on the right begin to move forward as the armored figure in the center watches on, arms crossed. What are you doing? You have three archways.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I go to the one that had that knight near it, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's the middle one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll go to the middle one. I'm going to keep the ball in front of me to obscure me a little bit. Not dead in front of me, but it's up here, just in case. Hanging my head a little bit. I'll go up and say: Power! So much power! I've never experienced anything like it before! Come! I need aid!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check with advantage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, first one was better. Ten, plus-- what is this?

lines.name: TALIESIN, MATT
lines.text: Deception.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Rot behemoth, the entities you saw patrolling Thar Amphala and two of them stormed into Sprigg's house, begins to follow behind him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So far it's going great, guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The armored figure approaches, gets within about 15 feet of you and stops. You see no face. This is Magneto-style; there's space for the eyes and the mouth, but it's too shadowed for you to make any features out. It's this dark void. You can see the hooked, spiked shoulders and the horns built to come out of the sides of the helmet. Arms still crossed before. "What did you say?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We were tunneling with the orb, and we found something. An ancient, dwarven artifact. It bends reality. It changed things. It changed my voice! It changed my whole world for a moment. It's still down there. Odell needs help!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The armored figure gives a subtle chuckle, "Very "well. Lead us to this find."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have been injured. Take the orb, go down to where we were, down that way. I will go get help for myself. Odell needs you to help him contain the power.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The orb jolts towards him immediately and he yelps. He's going to try again. Okay. With a second try, you can see the sweat on his brow as he begins to step backward, like, "I'm not really good with this." Are you relinquishing your control over it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They both begin to move forward and slowly push the orb past you. The vibration you hear getting louder in your guys' direction as the armored figure begins to follow suit behind. The rot behemoth begins to follow, and the armored knight goes, "Keep watch." The skeletons begin to move backward with the rot behemoth. Now you have the heavy footfalls of the large, looming rot behemoth in the center walkway and a handful of skeletons for that approach, blockading that, as the knight, with the two other hooded figures, begin to make their way towards the entrance where you guys rose up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You shouldn't have given them the Sphere.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What am I going to do with a fucking Sphere?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but we have to cave it in, and they're going to see.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, we're supposed to cave in shit?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're going to cave it in after them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Goddamn it, why didn't you tell me this plan?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We did.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So they begin to walk forward and slowly make their way towards the staircase that you guys emerged from.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm not the best at this game.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So we part, like the sea.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a brief moment, Pike, where your arm is on the side of one of the stone walls, and a piece of rock snaps and breaks to the ground. One of the figures with the hood back stops for a second and goes to look, just as one of the titan footfalls impacts and the whole area shakes sending other rocks tumbling around. It seems to be just enough to distract. They continue walking forward. You hear the hum of the orb as it slowly makes its way past you, faint hint of a Doppler. You watch them descend into the ruins that you emerged from, down into the tunnel.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So they can only move at the speed of the orb, since they have the orb with them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, they can move faster, but they won't have the orb with them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we still cave it in, though, behind them?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How many creatures are left guarding us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently, you still have the cluster of eight skeletons on the left one. There are four skeletons and the rot behemoth in the middle, and on the right, you still have one humanoid figure flanked by two hunched humanoid figures.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can definitely take the skeletons out, though, and sneak through, potentially, in that one tunnel. We should still cave this shit in, and it'll seem like a natural cave-in, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Skeletons we can handle pretty easily. So wait, it's 12 skeletons, one rot behemoth, and two--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't you think the thing that the big thing is guarding is the better path?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Probably.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are eight skeletons on the left path, four skeletons and the rot behemoth in the center, and then one humanoid figure with two crouched humanoid figures on the right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How spread out are those three groupings?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're about 40 or 50 feet from each other around a curved outcropping. From your perspective, it's around this. The center can see both; the right and left probably can't see each other too well. It's dark and there's a vanishing point around the curve where the far ends can't make eye contact.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Humanoids are the big problem.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But they can both see the middle?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They can both see the middle, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Out of all of these, the human with the two crouched things is what I'm most worried about.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because we don't know what it is?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, and humans have common sense.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we have a way to alienate these three that are walking to go see Odell? Do we, or do we not?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have the gem.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But we don't know what it does.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It may make the undead move towards it.

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But should we cave in this fucking tunnel so that they can't come back through?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How wide are the tunnel entrances?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're about 12 feet wide and about ten feet tall. And when I say they're arches--there's simple stone placed and then built around to maintain an arch, but they've been fairly recently constructed and it's more like the very basic beginnings of a mine shaft. It looks like these tunnels were carved probably once Thar Amphala arrived above the titan. So they're not extremely stable, but they're stable enough for passage in and out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The guy who talked to me, is he still here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He went with the orb.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Which archway did he come from?

lines.name: LAURA, MATT
lines.text: The middle.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to go up to the middle one and say: Excuse me, big fellow. I have to get by.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check. With advantage still.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't go too far from me!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25? The rot behemoth glances at you. You see its large metal cage-like helmet that guards its sunken head that rests squarely in the center of its chest at this point. The smell emanating from it is this awful combination of rot and long-putrid milk. You can see no face behind the mask, just glowing red coals for eyes. As it watches you as you pass, it doesn't make any motion.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to go in through the archway.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't keep walking fucking away from me!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to go a few feet in. Do I see anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see it seems to curve upward.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's stairs?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not stairs. It looks like the interior of this was made with a Sphere of Annihilation, like someone had taken a while-- because there's no dirt, there's no mounds of dirt around it. It looks like someone had been carefully carving this path. You get the sense this sphere has been a utility object since they arrived.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How far can I get before I'm away from 60 feet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have no idea where she is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I must have gone with them and then gone forward.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, they have to follow you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Every time you move forward, I have to move forward.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, you better fucking move forward. No, I'm at the threshold of the entrance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You walk about three feet past the behemoth and stop.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I take a knee. (groans)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It slowly turns towards you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm okay, I just need a second. (whispering) What's going on?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Move the behemoth away.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's going on with my brain? (groans) What's the plan?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Move the behemoth

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispering) Lead him away? Where?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Convince it that the people we sent away need it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I fall down to one knee again, and say: Ugh! Damn these legs! You must go help them! They'll die down there! Can't you see it's getting worse?! The pain!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is that the DM's face, or the creature's?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a straight charisma check. You have advantage because of the spell. You would.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just charisma?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just charisma bonus; charisma modifier.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That's all you're going to leave it at? 23?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can inspire yourself!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wouldn't it seem odd if I started singing to myself?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if you're crazy?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're in a fever dream.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can assist in your inspiration.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How? You're 60 feet away from me!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I assist in his inspiration?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anything you do to assist will reveal you from stealth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Including casting a spell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, I'll inspire myself. Why not? Oh, I get to roll something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a d12 and add that to your 23.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, another eight!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight onto that? So a 31. There's another long pause. Generally, an entity like this is tethered to the will of one creature. In most circumstances, it would not take any orders from anybody outside of it. But somehow, your words get it to consider in its simplistic, undead mind that if its master is in danger, then obviously the master would want help.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's robotics law one, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Somehow, your force of words circumvent the tethered command, and the behemoth begins to hulkingly make its way, with the four other skeletons, walking with the skittering of the skeletons, away, towards where its master disappeared.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to wait until it passes by me to whisper into my earring. (whispering) Maybe if we all go down the middle tunnel, then we can collapse

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Instead of collapsing three tunnels?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. We make a run for it and then collapse the tunnel. Because the other two tunnels are going to see us once we get in the middle.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. Yeah, I'm into this. Do people have abilities to make sure these people stay back and don't rush us while we get through?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're idiots. Just go!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But there's a person thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We stealth around the other side.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Because the skeletons are better to deal with.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you talking about collapsing the middle tunnel?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That we're about to go into.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should we entertain the idea of collapsing the tunnel that we sent everybody to? But all the danger, the majority of it, is behind us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can stealth-kill these humans super quick.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you collapse the one they went down? Then we'll collapse ours, too. Because the thing is a Sphere that can--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Even if you can just get the one. All of them coming back or chasing us is going to be a bitch. Even if it just slows them down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is all pretty much unworked stone for the most part? Since you said it was all self-carved. It's pretty rough.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's unworked, for the most part.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I could go earth elemental, go into the walls, collapse tunnel A. You guys make a run from it. I can earthglide through the walls, get to the middle as soon as you guys get through, and collapse second tunnel. But it might take a little bit. I don't know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What about the 60-feet thing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have to wait for the first wall to collapse, then we may run.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Make a run for it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I'll collapse tunnel one?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Collapse tunnel one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How far away is tunnel one right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tunnel one, the one with the eight skeletons--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, the one we came from.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, that one! With you guys having to keep at the 60-foot radius with Scanlan, it's about 80 or so feet behind you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Another option: you said that these three passageways, they curve this way, and that the two on the sides don't have a really good look at each other, right? On the left is a bunch of undead fuckers, right? And on the right we've got a humanoid and two little crunched over guys, right? So you've got that Silence doohickey, and us. So we could bet it all on stealth-kills, and creep in and go. Leave it all behind. One in the middle's now empty. One on the left over around the corner is undead.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who are you going to stealth-kill?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Humanoid and two creepy-crawly guys. If it pans out, we take them out, and the skeletons over there can't see over here. If we are quick, and then we go!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I would say collapse the tunnel, then go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We still have to collapse the tunnel.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. But kill them, and then make a loud noise. Because as soon as we start shit rumbling, everybody gets paranoid and upset.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'd have to be lucky.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're probably getting down to Odell at this point. We should hurry!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can throw up a wall of stone to block the tunnel we came from, and then we go and we do the other stuff.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's do it and go!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: The tunnel we came from.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you create a stone over that entrance?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. Once they're all in there, we block them in.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We block it up completely.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If they're all in there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, they've all been in there for about two minutes, at this point.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can we say that the twins and Freddie have been ready to go as you cast and make our move on these three on the side?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. Are you going for the three humanoids?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you sure? Those seem like the most powerful ones.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's why we stealth-kill them now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Stealth-kill them and get the drop.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So after that's up, we all move as a group in that direction so we're within 60 feet of each other.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, my spell is going to make noise, right? Should you guys stealth-kill first?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We could go for surprise kill if we want.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's what I'm saying.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You talk. You guys move over stealthily.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I stay with them as far as I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just the two of you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I'm at great distance.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do they look like from this distance?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see there's one hooded figure, hood up, holding a torch with one hand, but the torch is up above, so the shadow cast, you're not really able to make out any features or so. You can see the faint side of an older female face. That's all you can make out. And you see two shadow ghasts, the creatures that you saw leaping from rooftop to rooftop in Thar Amphala, and one of them you captured briefly at Sprigg's house. They're both on chained necklace-like chokers, being held in the other hand of this individual, like dogs.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we should kill her.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hopefully. Flick-flick on her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll an attack. Both of you guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, is it an automatic crit because it's surprise?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sweet! So 30 for attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30? Awesome. Why is my music not working? 30 definitely hits. For you, Vax?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's 25 and 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Here we go. I'm going to dump a smite into it, as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 19 times two is 28 plus eight is 36 damage on my first arrow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Second attack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 19 times two? Is what?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, 38. 19 times two is 38 plus eight. 46!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go, 46 damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: First dagger to strike does 88.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So the humanoid figure in the center holding the torch, all you see is them drop back to the ground as the chains clank to the ground. The torch clatters, and you see the light shift and flicker. The two shadow ghasts immediately look in your direction.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yep. That was one, so for my second arrow--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then the wall of stone goes over and covers the top. And you start catching up to the rest of the group? Grog, Pike? You're running to catch up with Vex and Vax? You're making the second strike?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I threw two daggers as part of the surprise.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead. This is against which shadow ghast, the left or right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going left.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You fired? To the left or the right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to fire at the same one that my sister does.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So 31 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that hits. What'd you roll, Vax, to hit?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It was earlier I did it. They both hit; it was 20-something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 19 on the left.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just seven for me, though, and that's all I'm going to do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Then you are shooting?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: First one is 32 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Second shot is 28 to hit. First shot is terrible! It's 12 points of damage. I don't have surprise bonus at all, do I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, because at this point they've already been made aware.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Second shot is-- oh my god, what a terrible roll! Ten points of damage. Nope, I'm so sorry! That's not nearly as bad as I thought it was. 16 points of damage. That's way better. That seven looked like a one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that's enough. Second shot destroys most of the upper body of the shadow ghast on the left. The loud gunshots going off in the cavern echoes, and you see the skeletons beginning to shift from the other hallway toward the direction the gunshots came from.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm booking it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys are rushing up, you manage to catch up to the rest of them as the final shadow ghast (snarls), and it only sees currently the two of you. It's going to run forward and it's going to move here. Even at its full distance, it gets right up next to you, but it's not going to be able to attack unfortunately. It uses its full movement and runs toward you with an unnatural speed and it leaps and lands on you with its claws grabbing your chest and you begin to fall back and start to catch yourself.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Stab! Stab! Stab!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make your attacks. The rest of you manage to catch up to the group.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Running up to the center tunnel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone else running up to the center tunnel?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Center tunnel. Go!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys approach, you hit the tunnel and begin to move inside as eight skeletons begin to curve around the corner.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we all in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, currently she's still being assaulted by a shadow ghast.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm still at the door, and I'll say: No! Get away from me, you interlopers! Evil-doers! That's right, you infiltrator! (screams)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perfect! You're stabbing at the guy that's got her?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 40 for the first. Second one is a seven. No, it's 17 for the second one, and the last is a crit, and that is eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll do it, actually. As you repeatedly jab your dagger into the back of it, its tongue is lashing out and its claws are trying to sink into her armor. Can't seem to find any purchase on her flesh. The horrible smell of its breath is on you as you watch as dark blood spatters out of its mouth on you as it's being stabbed to death on top of you. The weight pushes you onto your back, and you crumple onto the ground as it goes limp. You have to shove it off of you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I take Whisper and the venom dagger and lift it by the head off her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thanks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys are getting up to do this action, the rest of you made it up to the tunnel, and you can see as the eight skeletons begin to turn around the corner and begin hacking at the slowest who's there, which is going to be Pike. So Pike, you get four skeletons that are able to attack you at this entrance way.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's got this shit. She's a cleric! She's a monster.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13 misses. Misses. Misses. They all miss! They're scratching at your armor.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm almost there!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys run past the skeletons?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah because we're going to tunnel this shit anyways, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we're going to all get in and then, Grog, I'm going to have you punch the darkness.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15. No. No. 17, no. What's your armor class?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19, it rolled naturally, plus four equals 23. One has managed to finally get to you. It swings up with its shortsword at you, and you take eight points of piercing damage. One of the skeletal shortswords strikes across the back of your armor. It glides off and catches you in the edge of the ear and you're like (yelps). But you guys continue to run into this. Are you running with them?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I want to attack them so bad, but I know we need to go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll run, but I'll say: No! No, don't take me with you. I need to stay here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're our hostage now!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're shouting this to skeletons, you glance off over the back of your shoulder and you see a bit of torchlight emerge as a black orb burns through a stone wall.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's go!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I wait until everybody's through, and do I see a crack or nice weakened part in the archway that I can smack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check. You put your hand through to find a specific place--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hold onto your butts. 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13? Maybe.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I like the maybe. I rear back and hit the fucking shit out of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go ahead and roll.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Reckless. That's nice. 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24, that hits. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do I roll? 1d4?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 1d4 with the gauntlets then add your strength modifier.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, that's a one. Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, as you slam your fist into the wall, part of it breaks and cracks and you can see earth begin to fall and filter in and it's not enough to take it down. You can hear multiple skeleton voices and you see a bunch of them rushing up the hallway at you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I shoot the skeletons that are approaching?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to shoot, as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, both of you guys take fire. Throw your second punch.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 26 and 27 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24 points of damage? Right. As you guys all fire and begin to prepare your weapons, you strike with your arrows, with your gun blast, with your daggers as the top of the cavern caves in, swallowing whatever projectiles you were throwing, as well as closing off the entranceway. You can see now, as it falls forward, parts begins to shift.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Run!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I pick up Pike, and we start running.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you're grabbing Pike by the back of the armor and you guys are rushing. It is starting to collapse and fall behind you. At that moment, you feel the low sub-vibration of another titan footfall. At that point, it sends the rest of this cavern into a more rapid collapse. As you can hear the cracking sound of the rocks behind you, Grog, make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have advantage on those. It's okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If we're all running together he gets plus two from me, if he's within ten feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are probably a little bit higher up than him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both you and Pike suffer seven points of bludgeoning damage. The impact of rocks-- make an athletics check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, the rocks begin to collapse around you and they begin to pin your body, but the physical strength you have manages to break through and you are not held in the collapsing tunnel beginning to push forward. You all begin to rush. Slowly the sound of the collapsing tunnel subsides as you begin to glance upward and see the color of green-blue light approaching.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Approaching us? Or we're approaching it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can see the sky and we're causing the collapse behind us? We're up at Thar Amphala? Can we slow down at all, or do we have to keep booking it to avoid the cave-in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It sounds like the crumbling noises have begun to subside, and all you can hear now is the slow resting and easing to existing loose rubble and rock, the slow clattering behind you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we can slow down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys can slow down. You're about 15 feet from the surface at this point.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Very carefully see what's up there and find some cover.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I still got Pass Without a Trace because I didn't cast Hunter's Mark.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who are you people? What do you want with me?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I reach over to Scanlan, and I rip his hair off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You reach out, and your hand passes through nothing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is a great hat.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I got a new 45 stealth check, so I'm going to go peek. We're level 19. I'm level 19, y'all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A muffled boom is heard. You glance up, and see from the outside of this dome an explosion burst across the magical barrier. Harmless, then dissipates. Squinting hard, you can make out obscured shapes of wyvern riders. Swarming and circling the outside of the barrier.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there any city on the way to Vasselheim?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see a massive skyship hovering far above that's unable to do anything and is staying far enough out of reach to not unfortunately fall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have to get these shields down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome back, everybody! And welcome back, Ashley! Welcome back! We have our winner of the Wyrmwood giveaway: Pharadar! P-H-A-R-A-D, what looks like an A or an O? Possibly an E? R! You are the winner! Danoba will contact you and get your information so we can send you your awesome signed Wyrmwood piece of accoutrement! Congratulations! All righty. Coming back into the game, folks. As you all are waiting in this tunnel that emerges into Thar Amphala proper, Vax has taken a visual scope of the surroundings and the current circumstance. What do you do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Vax? Does it look like anyone has noticed the noise coming from this tunnel?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was about to assess that. Couple of questions: One, how far is the tower from where we are right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are maybe 150 feet or so from the edge, so you're toward the side of the city. The tower is in the very center, so it's maybe half a mile from you. It's not half a mile; half a mile is ridiculous. No, it's maybe 400 feet from you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Am I able to tell, if this is a giant, domed-in city, are we in a little corner of it, or are we coming up somewhere mid-range?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you were to look out at it from an overhead circle view, from the center, you're a little ways near the edge.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so not right against it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're about 150 feet from the edge.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How close are the nearest of the gloomstalkers flying around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, looking up, you see about three or four that are maybe 70 or 80 feet above you. But they're doing passes. They're not being stationary and they're constantly circling through. As you glance up and look and nudge away, you can see their yellow eyes piercing from their black, lightless form. Their wings, as they expand and shift, you can see that faint glance, the beams of their vision, scanning across the rooftops. They're all very intent on seeing what's going through the city.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And do I see any motherfuckers on the streets?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's pretty good. It's 29.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You also glance around past the gloomstalkers as you're keeping an eye. As you're scanning through the crowds, you see something different: larger, flying through the skies on the opposite end of the dome. It appears winged, with a tail, but porous, like a tattered sail or a ladder. A skeletal beast of long neck and tail makes a baneful circle over the city with burning green-blue eyes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it dragon-shaped?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's kind of dragon-shaped.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's Daenerys' dragon!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It appears to be skeletal. There is no flesh. With what little bit of look you can see, you can see the light behind the dome is--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How is it even flying?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there any color to it, other than dead?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's coasting around and you get one view of it as it begins to spin. You get a faint, distant glance at it. You only see one, but it is apparently also making its path over the city with the rest of the gloomstalkers. It does have stretched bits of broken, leftover flesh and leather that are tattered in places.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do me a favor and stay down there. It's a real party up here, and everybody's dead.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I like parties.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There is a dead dragon in the sky, and there's a lot of dead dwarves and other various types, and those things that Scanlan charmed a few days ago. It is really shitty up here, so stay put.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do any of them seem to have noticed this tunnel?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't believe so.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then come back down here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I back slowly the 15 feet that I traveled.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So what's the plan here, guys?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know how much further we have, but we really need that sword, right? We still have not seen the Sword of Kas?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've been thinking about that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh. Good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I haven't come up with anything. No, we could try and find the object. There are legends that say that the sword was lost somewhere near the city. We are, for as much of a moving, still in the earth somewhere near the city. We could find the sword.

lines.name: LAURA
