lines.text: Potentially.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, maybe it's in the dirt that we just came by!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I really hope we don't have to go back down there, but maybe. That might have been what they were searching for.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can scry on people. Can you scry on things?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can. I don't currently have Locate Object with me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have Locate Object.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can give my Scrying Eye to Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So that we can see it, so we can locate it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, because we haven't seen it yet?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know what it looks like. Unless we have seen it, in which case I still don't know what it looks like.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think the Death Knight was holding the Sword of Kas.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, we'll find out when we scry on it, won't we?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I pull out the Scrying Eye, toss it to Vex.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Have you scryed before?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I haven't.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit, you about to ride the Matrix, girl! You about to plug in!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Your first time's always disappointing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Try and focus real hard, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I focus on the Sword of Kas.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, and try and keep your mind clear and on the sword, or else you'll get other weird interference.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm thinking of so many other things, but I'm really trying to focus on this sword, okay? Penises, dicks. No, Sword of Kas! Sword!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's very phallic, but

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's surrounded by what you get a sense of, but there's no open space around it. It is in some thick, molasses-like silt.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's buried. Does it seem like the dirt that surrounds the Shadowfell? Is it that kind of dirt?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a dampness. When I say silt--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, now I'm thinking of dicks again! Hold on. Sword!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Focus, Vex! Focus.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Children.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm focusing!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you see it before you, but because it's seemingly buried in this area of damp rock and silt, you have no other idea of where it is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, but I did get a good look at it, at least?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As much as the Scry spell can employ, yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. All right, thanks, stone! It was not being held by that knight. No. It was buried somewhere.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I told you it was where we just walked by! I don't know if that's true.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to give Vax a super detailed description. I don't know if it helps, but I know we can both cast Locate Object.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, but you saw it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but I'm giving you a really detailed description!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But I didn't see it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're twins! Look into my mind!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You have the spell, yeah? So you should do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I have my Scrying Eye back?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have you scryed on any of us, without us knowing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You can admit it. It's okay. Come clean.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's a terrible liar. We'd know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I wanted to scry on Scanlan, but then Grog wouldn't let me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why would you want to scry on me?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, when you were missing and we didn't know if you were safe or not.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If you did, you would've seen this: a big black sword.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that what you call big?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm a little guy. Look, it's bigger than my mug!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you really paint Mythcarver black? Why would you do that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: For a joke.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to cast Locate Object and envision the Sword of Kas to see if it's around us. I cast it at 3rd level, though, because I used up all my 2nd.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Within a thousand feet of you. Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it a roll? No, it's a thing that happens.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In a brief instant, you close your eyes, recite the incantation, snap your fingers. As you do, from behind your closed lids, you immediately feel this draw, this sense, this direction. It is not moving. It is stationary. It is--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 3,000 miles away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's within a thousand miles. Let me see. Sense the direction. So you know the direction of it at all times. You don't know quite how far from you it is. You sense it's lateral and down from where you are. Deeper toward the city, but at a downward angle.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So underground. So we don't have to go above ground to find it. Do you guys want to spend time getting this sword?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It would be advantageous.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we really need it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's super important to fighting Vecna.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We had the ability to tunnel through earth, but this guy let it go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who are you people? Let me go! I'm innocent!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Your wife left you!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, that's true! (fake sobbing) That is my backstory!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about the earth elemental thing that you were going to do? Can you still do that and tunnel with that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That lets me glide through earth. It doesn't let me tunnel. I can do a Move Earth spell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can't take me with you if you glide through the earth, can you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You would die. You would suffocate and be crushed from the pressure of the earth.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Unless you wanted to hop in the necklace and give it to her in the elemental form.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But you wouldn't be able to help her find it in a necklace.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's that direction.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it the direction that we came from, or the direction that we are going, but down?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The direction you're going, but down.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Like hopping Earth orbit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We don't know if there's even any catacombs or anything down there. It could be buried in solid earth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Which is why Keyleth is clutch.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And it could be a thousand feet down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's probably what they were looking for.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's probably what they were digging for.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But they were going the wrong way.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's quite nice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, all right, shit. Do you know how close it is?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's within a thousand feet. Right? Yeah, no, I only sense things within a thousand feet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How much of a problem is the Move Earth, and how far can we go? A thousand feet, with the Move Earth?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if I point Keyleth in the direction? Can you glide as an earth elemental and find it that way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do consider, once you do find it, the sword cannot earthglide with you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, it can't?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If only we had some sort of sphere!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If only somebody hadn't sent it away! Which is, by the way, chasing behind us still.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, probably.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shit. But when it catches up to us, we'll take it back!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: See if you can take it back right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Simon? Answer your master. I can't.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keep trying.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The spell only lasts for up to ten minutes, by the way.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have to move quick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you've got to move quick.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to have to keep casting it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, here's the thing. I have an 8th-level spell left, and I have a 9th-level spell left. I want to save one of those. I can Move Earth and make 40-foot tunnels for up to two hours as I go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do we have the Gate Stones? Both of them?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. Gate Stones? They're not Gate Stones.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whatever, but yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do we have them?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have a great idea, but it'd take a little time. I have a little tub of oil that makes you ethereal, and if one of us-- you, me, whoever-- travels through the ethereal plane and walks down to the sword and waits with it and then pops back into the material plane--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Underground?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Finds it and then waits somewhere.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've got another idea. But your idea led to this idea. It's a building process. What if Keyleth took one of the Gate Stones, glided down there as an earth elemental, grabbed the sword, and then bamfed back to us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Would that work?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She'd have to become a different form.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: An earth elemental.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In your ethereal idea, do you leave your physical body and your stuff?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I'm on a different plane parallel to this one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She'd become an earth elemental in solid earth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It takes a minute to activate the stone, though. You would be down there-- that's the problem.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's why Keyleth could do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, but the voice from above said I can't glide the sword with me, but I should be able to grab it and then concentrate--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And change your form into an earth elemental.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I'll already be an earth elemental, and I'll have the Gate Stone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you have any sense of if it's buried very deep? Or is it sitting in a puddle of shit?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can send her in a direction.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We don't know, though.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, this is a good plan. What if we combine plans? Because etherealness can let you glide through your plane, right? It's a glidey thing, but for all things. Right, so can you take the potion, piggy-back on me, we glide together, get the sword--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She would not be able to hold onto it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I would help her find it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But you would be a mist. How would you tell her anything?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She would follow her.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How are you going to see?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We've got our awesome telekinetic earrings.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You still have to whisper in the earring.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're two different dimensions. It's two different planes. But if you or I, with Locate Object, douse ourselves in this oil and we locate the object, we know exactly where it is, and we move toward it and then go down there. It might be encased in a ton of stone or something. We don't know. We could go toward it, find it, and then go sit 20 or 30 feet away from it, wait to pop back into this plane, go grab it, Gate Stone up here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's not a terrible idea, if your stuff works that way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And if you can find a place to pop back into existence 30 feet away.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I can make tunnels, though, as long as I go with you. I can't find it alone. I can get close.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's also super loud and moves a lot of stuff, and shit collapses--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also, I should try to do it, because if I come back in a wall of stone, it doesn't matter.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All in favor of the ethereal idea, raise your hands.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How long does it last?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: An hour.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All in favor of the earthglide elemental, raise your hand.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, I thought we had to have more or less both, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have to have both.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why? We have the Gate Stone. Ethereal will take me down toward the thing. I wait by it, pop back into material, pick it up, Gate Stone back--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is Gate Stone immediate?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It takes a minute to do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's not how earth works, though. You can't wait down there and then switch back and then think you can grab this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We don't know that we're going through solid earth. It could be sitting in a foot-deep puddle of muck in a cavern somewhere. It's not like it was teleported into a solid mountain.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If it was sitting under a foot deep of muck, someone would have found it by now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've been stealthing for not too much space. I think that I could get pretty far.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I could do the same thing that she did.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But she knows what it looks like.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If you hand me that bauble again, I can do the same thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately, it's already been used.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You've got to let Vex go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is hilarious.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's got to be a Vex and Kiki. That's the thing: it's got to be both of us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can you follow her?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If you're ethereal, you're in a different plane.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're stealthy as fuck. We can get there, get close enough, get above it, and then--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're talking about going in the open air? Risking the open air to get closer?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's stealthy as fuck, and I can glide under the dirt.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Leaves a lot of room for a bad roll.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or we make a tunnel and we all go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't you go find it and come back and tell us?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's try your idea. You thought that I would be able to locate it by you telling me about it, so what did it look like?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I explain exactly what it looked like.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Awesome. I'm going to cast Locate Object right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you cast the spell, you close your eyes and snap your fingers. It can't find anything. Unfortunately, you have to have seen the object for the spell to have an effect.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I'm not upset at you. I'm upset at Laura, because this was my idea on the break, and it got yanked from me, but what are you going to do? I'm not upset. It's fine. I'm taking my marbles and going home!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So how long can you tunnel? And how long in each tunneling thing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus, If I give you a direction, you can tunnel in that direction, you can earthglide in that direction until you find the sword, grab a hold of it and try to bamf back. Let's try that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or tunnel back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: With you telling me where it is?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll point you in a direction.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's the range on the earring?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, can she guide me through--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait, the ring. Within 60 feet of each other. All of this was a waste of time.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Tunnel!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, I tunnel, then! Fucking hell!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This was so much DND right there. All the DND. Everyone who's ever played DND is right now going "yep, I've been there." All right, so what's the plan?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We tunnel towards the fucking sword.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We collapse the tunnels behind us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pike and I charge out of the tunnel.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You lead us, we go straight there. Less than a thousand feet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, let's go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know that this is burning, but we've got no choice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We know the direction. Go in that direction.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we going to try and go above, or are we tunnelling all the way there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In the direction that I'm pointing. Tunnel that way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to burn my 8th-level spell on Move Earth. I still have a 9th, and then this is reaching the end of my shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so this lasts up to two hours, concentration, and you can move a 40-foot space to create a tunnel every ten minutes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Every ten minutes? That's useless.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Under a thousand feet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Locate Object only lasts ten minutes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's within a thousand feet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then I can cast it again twice. I have two more times to cast it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A thousand feet is not that far.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you say 40 feet?

lines.name: SAM, MARISHA
lines.text: Every ten minutes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And we've got three of those, so we're going 120 feet?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, she can keep going that direction and then I'll cast it again in a little bit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's assuming we hit no pockets.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 240 feet. That gets us 480 total feet possible in two hours. Halfway.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's more likely that this thing is sitting in a pool of stilted water. It's probably not encased in a passageway of stone, because how did it get there?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Other than that, we're taking several hours to get there at a very slow pace.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And we might not get there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Two dozen plus things flying around. Pike and I are going to roll some stealth checks. It'll be great.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, fuck.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait!

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Wait.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughs) Does anybody know that joke outside of this room? Wait, that's right. We Instagrammed it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Scanlan, you still have a mansion?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We could break this up. Scanlan casts the mansion, we split the party, and we have a stealth team go get the sword and come back--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And Vecna knows where we are.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If they're in the mansion, though--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can't sense anybody in the mansion.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He can't sense anyone in the mansion, so we cast the mansion while you're still here. Half the party goes in, team Stealth Sword Recovery Plan goes out, gets the sword, while the rest of the team camps in the mansion.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If there's anything around that sword when you get there, you're on your own.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then we go away. We don't try to fight it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Unless we all want to decide, right here and right now, to try and get closer to the sword than the thousand feet we are potentially away from it right now, together as a team, and then cast the mansion. Or not at all.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs) This is craziness. I think there is an upside to Pike and I not having to roll those stealth checks, even with Pass Without a Trace, but if there's anything around that sword, it's going to be up to you to either fight it and get the sword, or get the fuck out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Avoid it, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You want to do that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Stealth team is not me, right? It's you two.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It'd be us two and maybe Vax, as well.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Corner three.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not that stealthy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does anyone have a better plan? Is this what we're going with?

lines.name: ASHLEY, TRAVIS
lines.text: Do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, then.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're also committing that this is where the mansion is going to live for the night? Is this a good spot for it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The sphere is coming out soon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth, Vex, you feel a very faint vibration in the ground.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does the sphere fuck up the mansion?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a Disintegration spell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Probably. We need to get out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, the mansion can't be seen. They would have to know that it's there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Even if it accidentally hits it, it's toast.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, we can hide it behind a closet or something.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's no closet. We're in a tiny tunnel.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I always carry a closet with me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing, guys?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's peek up. Is anything near us right now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And whatever the closest building is closest to the sword.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you guys all emerge out into the open light--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, we don't! We peek up first to see if anything's near us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Who, all of us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, just the ones who are looking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From this point, you can see there's a nearby building, maybe 20 feet from you, that is a two-story building that is partially collapsed, but still mostly intact.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there anything around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're all keeping a net of movement around.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to walk up to Grog and Pike.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear rocks beginning to emerge--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I grab Grog and Pike. We're going to run together. I activate my Silence spell. You two are in my Silence spell.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've got Pike in my hand.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And you still have Pass Without a Trace.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Still Pass Without a Trace.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, because when you cast Locate Object, that stopped.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I recast it! It's okay. I recast it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, mark that off. So as you guys all emerge topside, rushing this 20 feet distance, I need you all to make stealth checks. Grog, you make it with advantage; you're still visible--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That doesn't take up one of your Locate Object spells, does it? Then let me cast it. I'm casting Pass Without a Trace, not her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Using what spell level?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 2nd.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry, I misheard. I thought you only had a 9th-level spell slot left.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I'm talking about my big mack daddies in order to still cast other things.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I had to roll for both of us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But you have advantage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You had to roll for both of us?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But I had advantage. I think we're okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: For everyone paying attention, I have three 1st-level spells left, no 2nd-level spells, two 3rd, one 4th, and then an 8th and a 9th. And that's it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You have advantage on this?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do I have advantage? Well, I might have advantage also. I'm in the Silence spell also. Not that I need it, though.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That advantage saved that whole thing from going tits-up, because that first roll was (explosion).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Natural 19, so 29.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 18 plus nine plus another ten. 38.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait, don't high-five shit yet! Why are you high-fiving? What the fuck? What's wrong with you people? Jesus!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What did Pike get?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You all come into the shadow of the chamber and take a minute to breathe. You hear the distant sound (screeching, flapping, crunch). You hear one perch on one of the buildings about one block down (screeching, flapping) and continue off. It does not appear that you are currently being stalked or noticed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They can't hear you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It is visible, so is there a closet in here or some sort of alcove?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If I recall correctly, the entrance is only visible to people that you signify.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: People who see invisible things can see it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The entrance shimmers faintly and is five feet wide and ten feet tall. You and any creature you designate can enter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, it is visible, but only creatures you designate can enter. That's the difference. So it is a faint shimmer.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have to hide it, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I help him find a place that would be hidden?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Investigation, I got a 23. 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You go to help him. Most of the furniture in here is destroyed and withered. You go upstairs, and there is a double-door cabinet. A cupboard.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The Lion, the Witch, and the Wardrobe!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought the same thing!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Harry Potter lives there. I started reading Harry Potter.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I'm so glad!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Started?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'm on chapter three!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Greetings, time traveler.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I can't wait to take you to Universal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's going to be so great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you cast the mansion in the cupboard. The shimmering purple hue, the familiar vision of the door of Scanlan's magnificent mansion arrives. Who's going and who's staying? Pike, Grog, Percy, and Scanlan staying? The three of you going?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I hold out my hand to Vax and I say: Good luck. I hold out my hand to Vex and I say: Take care of him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just in case, is it wise to leave one of the Gate Stones outside the door? You take one so if you need to port back to it, it's here.

lines.name: LAURA, LIAM
lines.text: That's a good call.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does someone have to be holding it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nope!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Put it in a cupboard.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to leave it in the kitchen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To transfer to a Gate Stone? No, you have to activate it and hold it on one side, but it brings you to wherever the Gate Stone is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And then you guys have the other one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have the other one, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can get back on your own pretty easily, yeah? Tunneling through stone, do you have that left? Or that's done?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, if I'm an earth elemental, I can earthglide. I do still have that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I feel like maybe Vex should carry the stone, then. She has less of a chance of getting back on her own.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Hopefully we're together, though, but yeah. I toss Vex the Gate Stone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You pocket it. You sense you maybe have three more minutes on your spell, by the way, Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, it's that direction.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, we're in the mansion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, the rest of you head into the mansion quietly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If we drink wine tonight, it will only be in remembrance of you. Or to get snookered.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If we don't come back, save Vasselheim on your own and the entire world.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (singing) Empty chairs at empty tables...

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Team stealth is stealthing as far as we can, yeah?

lines.name: LIAM, LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god. Team half-elf! Yeah! This is me saying this, not Keyleth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, good to know. So as you all vanish in the mansion, you are outside of the need to utilize the radial portion of the ring. The three of you with the spell quickly waning, you begin to make your way outdoors. I need another stealth check from you three.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Another one?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I love you guys. Please come back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, don't fuck me, opal die. That opal die fucked me. Wait, do I have advantage? No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You have plus ten.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughing) Right out of the gate?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you get?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does my luck transfer to anybody? No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I do anything else? Okay, let's go! And I run into a door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you guys rush outward into the open way, you begin to head across the thoroughfare, following Vex, who's currently leading the charge, and you can sense it down below. At this point, based on the trajectory of it, make an intelligence check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They covered for me, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Intelligence?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, roll plus your intelligence modifier.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12? Okay. You're not sure of the distance based on the angle, but you know it's getting closer. So you guys begin darting from building to building. Keyleth is straggling a bit behind and ends up stubbing her toe and instinctually lets out a yelp sound. At which point, you hear a distant shriek.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (shrieking noise)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow, make it worse. That's a one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Go underground!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Earth elemental! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They both take off, one after the other.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fuck a duck.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Goddamn it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does that burn your spell? Are you done?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I'm beast shaped. I'm my earth elemental right now, okay? So I have tremorsense, right? I sense the twins.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to cast Locate Object one more time. Oh, that that takes me out of stealth, doesn't it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No. Oh. But I have Pass Without a Trace, which is still going.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you vaguely remember the direction it was in? So maybe we go vague for a minute?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So I pop my head out, Jaws-ing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I point in the direction and have her keep following it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I'm going to be like-- I'm going to follow their footsteps with my tremorsense.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And as such, you don't have to make a stealth check. You're down below, and you follow their footsteps underneath. You guys continue on your current stealth run. You get forward about another 150 or so feet. Do you want to keep going or do you want to cast?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there an abandoned-looking building or anything I can duck into?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a handful. Most of the city has been long abandoned.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, then I'm going to duck under something so I can cast the spell and then re-stealth before I come back out so I don't bamf in the middle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right. Okay, so you duck into a small alleyway. You guys are keeping out of view and waiting for the swarms of undead in the street, and as you come around the corner you immediately see about 12 or 13 zombies clattering past. As you're waiting for them to pass by, eventually they get quieter and quieter. You take a minute and you cast the spell Locate Object, and it's a much steeper angle now. You're getting much closer to it. So do you want to keep going?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. I want to re-stealth and move until I'm directly over it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll another stealth check. Both of you, actually, because we've gone partway through. Not that I have to worry about Vax.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, because you still have Pass Without a Trace from underneath.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eventually, you get to a point where you sense and almost--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did she just yawn?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, she just

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She stress exhaled.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: My hand, and it made a farting noise, sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're about halfway between the edge of the wall and where Entropis, the tower, is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to tap my foot on the ground and point directly down to you, Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Directly down. Doing this as I go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you swim down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, swimming down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, and you're feeling through earth. Make an investigation check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not my strongest suit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With disadvantage because you are currently blind in the earth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I'm awesome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can glide through it. But you can't see through the earth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm an earth elemental.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Give it a shot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on, you got this. Let's go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just roll high.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just drop it out your hand and watch as--

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Yeah, okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I count the ones out? Can I roll it again on the inside?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's not how it works.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it cocked? It looks cocked.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you roll?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we sure with disadvantage? Five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five. Okay. You swim around for about a minute or so, and you're finding nothing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm wise; I'm not smart. There's a difference.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not finding anything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, does she still have the earring on? Any luck?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She can't talk.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: because it's mental, yeah. Oh, wait. No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You don't know where it is?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I can't find it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I give her an idea of how deep down it feels, how far away it is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You failed your intelligence check, so you're not quite able to consider the changing angle for distance.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But maybe that etherealness thing, and now I can literally come up and drag you down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would I be able to see the sword, though, if I was on another plane?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intelligence check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think so, yeah. You just can't interact.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I get your thing of plus two because I'm standing next to you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's for saves, not checks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You don't know much about how etherealness works or what the effects are. You don't know if it will help or hinder. You're not entirely certain what the effects will do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Great!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But you still have Locate Object, and then you rub some on you, so you can still maybe sense it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I would know when it's right on me because I can sense that much, at least.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And you can still see everything. Yeah, you just can't interact with anything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Put that shit on me, then.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so I start slathering her up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As the oil slathers around you, your vision of the world becomes dark gray and colorless. It's very similar to when Frodo puts the ring on. There's a flickering sense, and the world itself seems to be immersed in shadow and not quite there. You watch as all the skeletons that are swarming through the streets and your brother all become translucent and almost not there, like these ghostly visions of them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know. Is it like Sauron? Is he going to be able to see me?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hush. Ignore him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Can I sink into the ground?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The ground's hard.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait.

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Wait.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The ground is hard.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, we've forgotten about the 60 fucking feet again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's not 60 feet away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You ignore objects and effects that aren't on the Ethereal Plane.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If you take the ring further than 60 feet away from me, we're blown.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But it might not be 60 feet away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll stay 60 feet within the surface of the earth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we still have another one of those potions? You can come with us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, no, this is a point of order here: ignores all objects and effects that aren't on the Ethereal Plane. This is complicated.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is one of those stupid DND, now we have to interpret what they mean.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a DM call on him, I think. Or how he wants to translate it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So here's the thing. Here's technically what happens: as the oil begins to be pressed along your body, you begin to look around and notice as your vision goes gray and everything begins to fade,

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So I would disappear? I would fall?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let's see here. This is getting really wonky.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I cancel it once it starts getting on me and I'm like, this does not seem right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Shit might get really weird now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I might just be gone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thar Amphala, there is no version of it on the Ethereal Plane, however, which means that currently you can pass through the ground.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. My apologies.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm on another plane of existence, though?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Ethereal Plane overlaps this one. It layers it in a similar way that the Shadowfell does.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You are actually perceivable? But only to the things that can perceive.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But the proof is in the pudding because if that ring were gone from my presence, Vecna would be bending me over a barrel right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's doing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you dissipate in the Ethereal Plane--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Poor Ashley.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: This is so stressful!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, though. Come on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I didn't think about the fact that it works in a different fucking plane.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That makes sense.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you vanish into the space, a little whisper curls into your ear, Vax'ildan. "Ah, there "you are. I've been looking all over for you and your friends. Welcome." And that's it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everybody back to Chicken Town. Chicken Town! And I click the Boots of Haste, and I start booking back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're abandoning your sister?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it's okay! I've got the thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's me and you now; we got this. We're good. Go!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're staying?!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm getting the fucking sword!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm hearing this over the earring. I just heard that. I heard it. Vecna whispered to me, and I said that to everybody through the earring. She shouted back at me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But they don't hear you because they're not in the same plane with the earrings.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does she still hear me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, she doesn't.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But I heard that, so: You're not going to go?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm getting this sword. I'm here now under the fucking ground!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can't talk to you anymore.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm just floating downwards.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I reach up. Can I grab your shin?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I realize Keyleth's not going anywhere and I plunk down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hang on, wait. Can I hear you, can I see you? Nothing with her?

lines.name: TRAVIS, LIAM, MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why did we do this, then?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know. Keep going. Keep doing it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Because it's late and this is what's happening.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Back in the mansion, we're all sipping wine and I'm saying: I know our friends will come back to us, and I know that they won't ever lead anyone here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make another check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I float or am I stuck on the surface of the ground?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let's see here. You can move up or down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to go down towards where the sword is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You glide through the ground.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that 12? Okay, all right, that's actually not too bad. 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, was that with disadvantage?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You're still floundering around. You have Vax dart off and Vex has vanished.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If she screamed, I stopped once I realized she wasn't leaving. I stayed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So are you darting back?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And nobody replied and I stopped because I doubted it, and I'm waiting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, are you going to stealth?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, of course, but Vecna's whispering in my ear. 33 and Pass Without a Trace, so 43.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You should go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's currently in ethereal form drifting down; we should see what happens with that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your movement speed, at double movement, would be 60 with the double dash. You're moving 30 feet per round because when you're moving through the Ethereal Plane through solid objects and matter, it does slow you to half speed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I sense Keyleth at all? I can't see her, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And as you come into this ten-foot little cavern space, half of the floor is coated in this brackish green fluid, and the other half is solid rock.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I keep going towards the sword.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking around, you can see that there is a thick residue that is gathered along the edges, and there at the bottom, you can sense, though you cannot see it because it is actually a few inches beneath the muck, you assume, the sword.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can't touch it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I know where it is. Can I come up into the cavern, and you said there was rock outcropping that I can stand on? Can I get this shit off of me, the oil off of me, or am I stuck as an ethereal form?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is going to be an interesting question.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How long does it last on the oil?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I lost the paper, but I'll look it up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I feel like it lasts for an hour. Let me double check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I think that's what it is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It lasts--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One hour.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shit. (laughs)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've got to bail on it and come back for it later, if at all.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, not necessarily.
