lines.text: We definitely do want to show you a good time about it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And what is your idea of a good time? Unbutton, unbutton.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And we certainly don't expect that to be accomplished without something given in return. Of course.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Now we're talking. I could help."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can do that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "More or less."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And what would you request?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well... You all dress very differently than the last time we met. You're doing well for "yourselves, then?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's been a hard day.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have a bakery.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's quaint."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In comparison to the world events--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm pretending to be a mage right now, so.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We've established order back in our realm.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm unkillable for a while.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (high-pitched) Well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm a crime lord. I can get you really good discount furniture.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Coming back sopping wet and naked I'll say: And we've got this weird thing that we're not entirely sure about.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We found this ball of light. Crystal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Tell you what. I'll help you under two conditions. One: should you go back and defeat "this wannabe god thing you speak of and all is well and you're heroes and you have all of this "influence and money and everything's grand, we can discuss maybe creating a doorway for me that "allows passage. I'll come visit and see what strangeness your world seems to have whenever I'd like."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know if you'd like it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, I'm sure I can figure out a way."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's real dicey at the moment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But I'm sure if you succeed, that won't be a problem, and if you fail, well, then I guess the "deal's off, anyway."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Very true.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Second: I wish to strangle you until death." (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's into autoerotic asphyxiation?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughing) Amazing! Oh my god!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait, Grog. I'm sorry. Come again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I wish to put my hands on your throat until you expire. If you say you're unkillable, well, "that's a new experience entirely."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Okay. Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Will you come back? Have we tested this?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Vex, be quiet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have one further request on our end. Can you send us backward in time?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm afraid it doesn't work that way, but I could give the mere passage of an hour."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mere passage of an hour? That's good, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Day for an hour. I think it's a fair trade, yes?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can you give us a full day in order to make sure that he does come back?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sure. Day for an hour. 24 hours are yours to do as you like."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You would come back in 24 hours, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I ask one question first? Will you be pleasuring yourself during this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He actually laughs at this and goes, "I think the process will be enjoyable enough."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. I respect you so much.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Since we're making a deal, I want to make sure of a few things, because I love making deals. First of all, as perhaps a token of friendship, do you have any idea what this is? I am still apologetically naked and wet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's a pulse stone."

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: A what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "A pulse stone."

lines.name: LAURA, SAM
lines.text: What is that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's meant to distract undead.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How do you activate it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It just does."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you. Second question is: when we do return in an hour, where are we going to reappear?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's up to you. I'm just altering the time flow. Do you not have a means of returning? "You found your way here."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The place that we're meaning to return to is moving. Could you send us to a moving place?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's Keyleth that's sending us back, and she can.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you send us back? We have to send ourselves back?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a large enough endeavor in itself."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can get us back to Thar Amphala on the Material Plane and specify that, but it doesn't specify where we're going to land in Thar Amphala.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is great.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I got a question, Artagan. Do you know if--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is is

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Take your preference. I'm just happy to have friends."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Garmelie?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you must." And he winks, and for a second you see his form shimmer and you see the small satyr image for a moment before it restores to his grand visage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Another strange question: have you ever had access to our world before?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "A long time ago."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Have I read about this cat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intelligence check. Just the intelligence modifier.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't remember being in the Feywild at all, or meeting him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You don't?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, it was restored via spell.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, that's right. But does that restore memories?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As part of the actual effect, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have no idea who he is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nope, no idea. None, nope. I have no idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You've had access, but you were blocked?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Things rearrange every eon or so, and the ley lines that guide the paths shift, and I "haven't been able to get back since."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That seems most unfortunate.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're not going to become addicted to strangling people because you've tried it on him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know. I haven't tried it."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How long does he have to be dead in your hands before you decide that it's worked?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I tell if he's lying?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, make a deception check. Sorry, an insight check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Lying about which one?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Never strangled someone before.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have no idea. He's slippery. He's mercurial.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is the problem with fey. They don't tend to lie, they tend to tell just most of the truth.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. With a couple of provisions here, all right? One: you cannot say shit while you're doing this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's not allowed to talk?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is correct.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Fair enough. I think it would spoil the moment, anyway."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Two. And this includes the rest of you lot: everybody leaves, except for Scanlan and Grog, and they stay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I'm all right with that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't want to see it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think that's a fair request.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I pleasure myself?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I whap Scanlan on the head.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know how to feel about this!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let him do it. You'll come back, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is so weird. Okay, wait. Keyleth pulls Vax aside.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Gross, stop!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's like a dog, you got to pull him off your calf!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you sure about this? Are you okay with this?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll see you soon.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can ask if he wants something else!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ask him. I don't think he does.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And you'll be back, yeah?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Probably.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In 24 hours or so?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll be back.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, but how do we know for sure?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Guys, go. Go on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have no choice, Pikey.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is what's happening.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We got an eye. We'll keep the rule of law.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you want to stay, too, Pikey?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Percy?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm not going to stay if he doesn't want me to stay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Take Keyleth out of here, please.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Absolutely.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, no! Wait! I try to give him a kiss before we leave, before getting dragged out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Vax, I want you to know I've never been more proud of you than I am right now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want you to laugh your fucking ass off, all right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I might. I'm just saying, you're about to buy the ticket and take the ride of a literal fucking lifetime.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is fucking weird.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're not here anymore.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm saying as myself: this is fucking weird.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is weird. This is like a weird snuff film.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't know where this came from?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How do you feel? Are you nervous?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You keep an eye, have him drag me somewhere safe, and keep an eye on me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I put my hand on his chest? Is the heart still beating?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, slow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it beating any faster? Because he's nervous.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A hint.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Still pretty chill.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Carry on.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you want us to hold anything? Do you want to wear your clothes?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's stop talking, folks. Could you look after Keyleth, please?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course, darling.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: See you tomorrow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: See you in a bit.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't worry."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is not the worst thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Artagan, this is weird as fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Welcome to my world."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. I slowly walk away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Pike, have you left as well?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to go swim.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to swim.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Everyone's backing off.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're swimming naked while my brother is dying. No big.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, Grog. All he gets to is strangle me to death. That's it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right. What about after you're dead?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No touch at all, no pickle?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Neither Artagan or Scanlan are able to do anything to me once I'm out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh! Oh, okay. Yeah. Right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And then make sure he doesn't lose me in the woods or something, okay?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You'll be fine. This will be harrowing for you, but you'll be fine. We'll bring you back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's been so much fun until now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is a sacrifice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is great!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't speak.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fair enough.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I walk up to Artagan. All right, fucknut, let's do this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You believe this? You really believe you're going to come back if you die?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (clicks tongue)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Fair play. To the immortals." And he takes your throat and begins to squeeze, his eyes locked in, and he keeps watching you.

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: This is so dark.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I step up behind Vax in case he has an involuntary reaction to reach up to his arms. Just to keep his arms down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He locks in.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No fear, remember.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Without making any other noise, continues to apply pressure. Eventually, your vision begins to go dark.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm so glad we can't see this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, no. Underwater.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'd be freaking out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I look away.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm peeking out of the pond.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I grab her and drag her right back to the pond.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is so weird.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is your head, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You could have asked for a magic wand or a unicorn, a pony.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was a fascination with something different and new and you said "cannot die," and that immediately piqued his interest. Even the nicest of fey are weird and have their dark sides.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Preach, David Bowie.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You watch over the next minute or so as he strangles the life out of Vax.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you hungry right now? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is so fucked up!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is quality internet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know. Limp in his grasp, Garmelie eventually pulls one hand back. Still holds him now; his feet are dangling, and goes like: "Satisfying, but not what I thought it would be." At which point, you watch as the body and flesh of Vax begins to burn to ashes out of the armor, and the armor falls to the ground in pieces.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh god. Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, last time he got disintegrated, so we didn't really see him evaporate. But that makes sense.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to look at Scanlan. Were you expecting this at all?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, not at all. What the fuck is this?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to grab the armor, if you don't mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course. It's yours."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, thank you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll scoop up everything.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's go away from the group, into the trees. Hopefully, that won't kill us. And we lay it down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll make a little circle of rocks.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, stop it! I kick the rocks out of formation.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're not there!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I thought he dragged it outside.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're in the woods. We're in the pond.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I wanted to shave half of his head because he shaved my beard that one time, but there's really nothing left of him right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't think that that would be a good time to do this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys are swimming, the water breaks and you see the still dry hair as it emerges from the pool of Garmelie, though he is now undressed in the water, as well. "Ah! So that's one deal "done. Where do you wish to rest?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Is it safe to rest?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "While I'm here, yes."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. (whimpers) Should we wait? We need to wait 24 hours to bring him back. It takes 24 hours?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nobody knows that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Somewhere in that time? How long did it take last time? It wasn't a full 24 hours, but it was the next day.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was that night.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't want to leave.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Might be a dawn thing. We moved and he appeared.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's the thing about dawn. It takes a while out here, doesn't it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Dawn doesn't really exist out here. It's just a rest.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's like a Vegas casino: it's always the same twilight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, well. Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is there somewhere else that we could go to recuperate?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wasn't expecting the ashes part.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, this is crazy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is it bad if we set up camp right here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, let's set up camp here. We know this area.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course! Please." And he points over and you look back to where you were on the edge of the pool, and you can see there's a bunch of stumps that weren't there before that seem to have elongated into chairs and couches and bits of furniture.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit. Nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (sighs)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we going to rest here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but we need to do a feast before we go back. Well, the thing is, it uses a spell, so it has to be within the 24 hours.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That will be the last thing we do before we go to sleep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, but I want Vax to have the feast, as well, so--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can we save him leftovers?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we have to wait a whole day before he comes back?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We don't know how long it takes. We can try to wait and see how long it takes and then rest?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have a little time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's give it some time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Besides, Garmelie gave us his word.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One day.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "One day."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So we might as well wait a few hours, at least, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Anything else we can accomplish here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We can play."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This feels weird to play.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, do about yourselves. You seem disturbed by my presence."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I do have a question.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you familiar with the werewolves that roam these lands?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I am familiar with the werewolves that now roam these lands, yes."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right. Are they around this part?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, not at the moment."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can sense them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have an idea where they might be. I know when they're not near me."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's all. I'm just saying. Just curious.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, Artagan. Does killing a wannabe god sound fun to you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sounds interesting."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It would be much more fulfilling than strangling a person that didn't fight back, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would you want to come through with us?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Give a little tour of our land that you so desperately want access to.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's currently a giant city walking its way towards another giant city.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Some sweet action with some stuff maybe you haven't seen before.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A skeletonized dragon. A gold dragon.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Undead dwarves.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Cannibal undead dwarves.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One-eyed prick named Vecna.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I mean, that'd be great but I

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. You have to have a specific doorway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Once you have the door, I'd be happy to join you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. And that's a time-consuming sort of thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Depends how long you can build a doorway, I suppose."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sounds like a time-consuming thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Most likely. No offense to any of you if you're carpenters."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Very tricky.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, take your time! Rest. Food is prepared. You can go amongst yourselves. I'll be "here, splashing away." And he splashes into the water.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That guy knows how to relax.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that how he lives all the time?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Probably put clothes on to be nice around us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sylas is alive.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What did you say?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sylas. She said Sylas is alive.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sylas is back.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Briarwood?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, didn't you see him right before we left? He was right in front of Delilah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm watching to see if anyone eats the food.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. I was eating all the food in the mansion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plenty of food on these small stools here and there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Remember what?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know what I was going to say.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Didn't you evaporate him with a Sunbeam or something? And then we like killed him in a coffin?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We killed him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sylas? Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wasn't it Pike who killed Sylas or was it you? It was you. Oh, that's right, and you said "eat a bag of dicks."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bag of holy dicks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's been a long time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I shot the beam off of Pike's shield. It was actually pretty dope.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Great, so he's back.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to go over by Vax's armor and stuff. Just sit there and flop it around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Armor fluffer?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is there anything you guys wish to accomplish in this time, or do you want to take time to wait to see if your friend returns?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What can we accomplish? What can we do? There's got to be something we can do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I need to accomplish something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do you need to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know. I have a spell, and I can use it before we rest, but I don't know what to use it on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I can do a few different things before we sleep. We can go out into the woods and find an animal, a big animal. I could turn it into something, like a flying thing that we could give to Grog so he could fly. Fly with that sword.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like a mount sort of situation?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like a wyvern.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can turn an animal into a wyvern?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Any animal?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A big animal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Bigger than Trinket?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it permanent?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, never mind, then.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it a big spell for you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket? Would you want to be turned into a wyvern?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Forever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (questioning bear noise)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hold on, let me see if I've got Speak With Animals. I don't think I have it. It's 1st-level, I can still do it! Trinket?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would you want to be turned into a wyvern forever? (whispering) Say no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What's a wyvern?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's like a lizard that's really big that's got wings. Not so much? Okay. Just checking. I just wanted to make sure. It's your choice, darling.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did he say yes?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, he said no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You haven't been saying shitty things to my bear, have you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket, don't ever listen to him. He's horrible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (spits) (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or I could do other things.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like what?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could do other things. I could make another compatriot for us to have in battle.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like another Artagan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Like another Scanlan. Or another Pike.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would they be fully capable to cast all your spells?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Spells.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or I could do other things.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Actually, that last one is pretty dope.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, two Scanlans.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Get all your turns, all your everything? Two times whoever you make?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know. Never done this before.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, what kind of spell is this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a crazy spell.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do that one. Fuck the flying thing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But if you could fly--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I know he hovers and flies, but.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. You could bring that sword to his neck.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Could you give Grog wings?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a real thing. Magic would not stop it from flying. It would be a

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A real thing that could be killed right out from under him, though.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, but it couldn't be dispelled with magic.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Could be disintegrated, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then Grog would fall.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can you cast Fly on somebody?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No. I can turn you into an eagle.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not with that sword.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. The option of having a second caster like you is way bigger than making me fly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Another Scanlan who could easily be destroyed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, but so could one of us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, it'll be a magic thing that could be dispelled.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If they know it's magic.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But you just said the other thing couldn't be destroyed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That thing couldn't. That would be a different spell altogether.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I still like that idea better.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's other things, too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like what?! (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could cast a spell on one of us that if you died, it would activate, and it would heal you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Completely?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, Death Ward. Pike can cast that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Whatever you do, I can get me plus eight other people through with Plane Shift. Eight willing creatures.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But my Death Ward would last for ten days.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There are not going to be ten days. We don't need a ten-day Death Ward. We need a one-day Death Ward.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus, we all have our blessings-- not all of us. We have some blessings from gods that will activate, hopefully, right before.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can you do a one-day blessing on ten of us?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can you cast Haste?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No. I mean, I could, but it seems like a shitty use--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If there's two of you and you could cast Haste on me, I'd take that over the flying creature.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If there's two of me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, you with Haste would be horrifying.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's nasty. It doesn't get me off the ground, but at close speed. I'd have a hundred feet of movement.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And another attack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Plus an action surge.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't cast Haste. I don't know it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can't? Hey, Pike, do you know Haste?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No. It's not a cleric spell.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who does?

lines.name: LIAM, LAURA, TALIESIN
lines.text: None of us have it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just the boots.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You've got a decision to make. We've got sleep to get.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've plotted, you've thought, you've napped, you've contemplated this weird bubble of time that now exists, this brief respite, but where it leads you is unique and strange. As you all begin to question and wonder, is he going to come back? Does he come back here? Last time you saw him, he arrived with you in the Feywild.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, and he died in the Material Plane? (gulps) Oh shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you carried the ashes with you then. As soon as these doubts begin to emerge, you turn at the sound of a footfall and around the corner, hand on the side of a tree, you see for the second time in this grove a nude Vax'ildan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: MARISHA, ASHLEY
lines.text: (sighs of relief)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (cheers)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that's where we'll end tonight's game.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: For the second time: butt-naked ending!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because it is past 11. Man, a lot of weird shit happened that game!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have to go home with you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm sorry! It made sense for him in the moment!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, that was--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Awesome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was a weird, dark shade of the fey you don't see.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It was the best thing I could have ever hoped you said.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I didn't expect it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It certainly made us opening a doorway so he can get into the real world a little bit more questionable.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But that's the fun of it. How much can you trust any fey?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No. They're monstrous. I'm so excited.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Man, I'm sorry the etherealness went bottoms-up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, it was great.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We still did it! We still got it!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We came close to fucking up that ring proximity thing seven times, and then finally we did fuck it up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was probably an eventuality. (laughs)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can the episode title be "Dicks and Dicks"? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll see what I can do.

lines.name: TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: Dungeons and Dicks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But anyway, thank you guys. We're going to get some rest. Thank you guys for going with us through this very interesting episode.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ashley, your drawing was amazing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ashley!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Post that shit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. We'll return next week, and I think we'll have a special guest next week.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What? Is that true?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you, Marvel Puzzle Quest.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Thank you, Marvel Puzzle Quest.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Show them support, show them love, guys. They really appreciate it. Tweet at them, follow them on Facebook, add them as a LinkedIn friend. Sext them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Check their Myspace.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sext them? Yeah, send them a bunch of porn links.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, don't do that. Please don't do that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was a joke! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [music]
